page.title: 15AN EDDERTON PENSIONER'S LIFE
page.content: The oldest person in Edderton is 90 years old. She gets up about 9 a.m. and gets dressed. About 1 hour later she has tea and toast which normally keeps her satisfied to about 12 o'clock. Then she has a light snack which takes her to about 6 p.m. and she has another light snack which will last her to bed time when she has a sandwich. During the day she does a lot of reading and some house work such as dusting and sweeping the floor. In the evening she watches the television till about 8 p.m. then reads again.From 9 p.m. to about 11 p.m. she either watches television or reads.When she checks all the electricity is off she goes to bed. She spends most off the time in the house as she is unsteady on her feet. Her grand daughter and her great grandchildren visit her daily.
